Dialogue.Page: Good job. You won, or something.

DialogueOption.Text: Cool. I'm qonna quit the game now.

Dialogue.Page: You reached the end. That's it. You solved the puzzles, or accomplished whatever it is you set out to do.
So that's it. You're done here.

DialogueOption.Text: I'll take your word for it. I've seen all there is to see.

Dialogue.Page: Oh yeah, those things wanted you to find the black hole so they could explore space before everything goes kablooie.
One of 'em said they could read your memories, or something. So they try to follow in your footsteps every loop to explore what they can before the loop occurs.
I guess that means they end up exploring the universe kinda like you. Or something. But I digress...
You reached the end. That's it. You solved the puzzles, or accomplished whatever it is you set out to do.
So that's it. You're done here.

DialogueOption.Text: I'll take your word for it. I've seen all there is to see.

Dialogue.Page: Sure, if you're not done looking around. I'm not the boss of you (Actually I am I forbid you from going back).
Anyways, some guy told me to tell you something, but I forgot what it was.
It was something like "Thanks for playing!" or something like that. Or maybe it was something about this being made in only a week for a modding jam?
I can't remember, they didn't pay me back those fifty Hearthian coins they owe me.
But anyways, you can go back to the "surface" with that black hole over there. But that's all.
